question: The antidote for benzodiazepine toxicity is -
exp: Ans. is 'a' i. e., Flumazenil. Drug. Antidote. AcetaminophenN-Acetylcysteine or Mucomyst. Anticholinesterase. Atropine or Pralidoxime. Anticholinergics, diphenhydramine, Physostigmine. Dimenhydrinate Ethylene glycol. Fomepizole, Ethanol. Benzodiazepines, Zaleplon, Zolpidem. Flumazenil (Romazicon). Beta-Blocking agents, Calcium channel blockers, Hypoglycemia, Hypoglycemic agents. Glucagon, Epinephrine. Calcium Channel Blockers. Calcium Chloride, Glucagon. Coumadin. Phytonadione or Vitamin KCyanide. Amyl nitrite, sodium nitrite, sodium thiosulfate. Cyclophosphamide. Mesna. Digoxin. Digibind or Digoxin Immune Fab. Heroin. Naloxone (Narcan) or Nalmefene. Iron. Deferoxamine. Heparin. Protamine Sulfate. Lead. EDTA, dimercaprol, succimer. Methotrexate. Leucovorin calcium. Potassium. Insulin + Glucose, Kayexalate. Valproic acidL-Camitine. Isoniazid. Pyridoxine HC1 (Vitamin B6). Arsenic, Copper, Lead, MercuryD-Penicillamine (Cuprimine)
